title: Corn Tacos
instructions: Season the planted with cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, and a pinch of cayenne. Saut√© in olive oil until crispy, about 5-6 minutes.
Char corn kernels in a hot dry pan until slightly blackened, then toss with lime juice and cilantro.
Warm corn tortillas in a dry skillet or directly over a gas flame until pliable and slightly charred.
Prepare toppings: dice tomatoes, slice radishes, shred lettuce, and make a quick crema with sour cream and lime.
Assemble tacos: layer tortillas with the seasoned planted, charred corn, and fresh toppings.
Drizzle with crema, sprinkle with fresh cilantro and cotija cheese, and serve with lime wedges.
